name: Tempered Talisman
relicLoreTooltips: Never before have the nine Rings of Hell collaborated on something as monumental as the Rail of the Covenant. As a token of thanks, I created these amulets through my time in Hell, imbuing them with some basic power, and I gave them to each clan.

additionalTooltips.title: Magic Power
additionalTooltips.description: Increases the amount of damage dealt and health restored by spells.
